MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the DG4 postcode area of Dumfries, affecting properties in Sanquhar and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 9:16AM. Our control centre will attempt to reset the network remotely to restore power in stages, and our engineers have arrived onsite in the local area to investigate and repair the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30AM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:34AM on 14 February 2021.
